home.title: Welcome to Axie Scholar Tracker
home.text: In this application you can search for candidates who are requesting a scholarship, here you can find if a candidate already has a scholarship
home.note: Help the community a lot by registering the data of your scholarship recipients, this is so that other managers can check if their candidates already have scholarships and thus not incur any faults

login.title: Login
login.text: Enter and manage your scholarship recipients
